channel.title: Need a few knowledgieszz
channel.description:
Hey, could anyone tell me how to make max cash more then 2147m,
How to put a X button instead of 10 in the shops, so u can enter a amount instead of clicking
How to add this: When ur in trade and u enter a amount, u gotta typ 10.000.000 without the dots
And how do i make it so u can typ 10m?
Thank you.

item.title: Need a few knowledgieszz
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Max cash fix
Int storage range is only 2,147,483,648 to 2,147,483,647
Change the int to a long, which has a range of 9,223,372,036,854,775,808L to 9,223,372,036,854,775,807L

Buy X
Search around for something like

This should direct you to your buy 5 option. There you can edit and change it to buy x using a string

Read full topic
